Articles.Content: I've a problem with my original copy of KSP. The loading is very long, every file loads in 5 seconds. But This problem started suddenly, before work and not now, why? I've a good pc, very good.
Have you tried the suggestions in this topic? http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/93666-KSP-is-taking-10-minutes-to-load?p=1432481#post1432481
